name: homa-health-care-phase3
description: HOMA Health Care Google Fit Integration - Phase 3 diabetes platform with health tracking for 35+ patients

scripts.test: node -e "console.log('Server test - checking syntax...')" && node -c server-phase3.js && echo "✅ Syntax OK"
scripts.health: curl http://localhost:3023/api/health || echo "❌ Server not running"
scripts.install-deps: npm install express cors googleapis @supabase/supabase-js dotenv

author: HOMA Health Care Team
